bioconda.name: bioconductor-methylpipe
bioconda.summary: Base resolution DNA methylation data analysis

biotools.summary: Memory efficient analysis of base resolution DNA methylation data in both the CpG and non-CpG sequence context. Integration of DNA methylation data derived from any methodology providing base- or low-resolution data.

bioschemas.name: methylPipe
bioschemas.summary: Memory efficient analysis of base resolution DNA methylation data in both the CpG and non-CpG sequence context. Integration of DNA methylation data derived from any methodology providing base- or low-resolution data.
